article:
I like fishing. Every Sunday I get up early and  _  a bike to a river.
This morning my  _ wants to go with me after breakfast. We go by car first and then walk to the  _ . After we get there, we sit down and I start to  _ . In two hours, I catch nothing.
"All right, let  _ have a try." she says. She  _ six big fish in half an hour. "I'll go home and I'm going to cook them for  _ . You  can take the bus home," she says.
I stay by the river but catch only an old shoe. I feel a little  _ with myself.  _ is the fisherman in the family? My wife or I?
